Eleunild: Female Tiefling Cleric, LG. Str 7, Dex 14, Con 6, Int 13, Wis 14, Cha 12. Eleunild has dark red hair and gold eyes, and wears glasses with copper rims. She wears studded leather and wields a handaxe and shield. Eleunild is chivalrous and optimistic.

Gotha: Female Tiefling Warlock, LN. Str 12, Dex 12, Con 7, Int 10, Wis 9, Cha 15. Gotha has curly blonde hair and silver eyes, and a flicking forked tongue. She wears leather armor and wields a club and light crossbow. Gotha is moody and ambitious.
Gotha: Female Tiefling Druid, Neutral. Str 8, Dex 11, Con 6, Int 7, Wis 14, Cha 10. Gotha is tall, with dark red hair and red eyes. She wears hide armor and wields a mace and wooden shield.

Thelcho: Female Tiefling Wizard, NE. Str 10, Dex 17, Con 9, Int 15, Wis 11, Cha 9. Thelcho is tall, with gray hair and black eyes. She wears well-made clothing and wields a dagger and darts. Thelcho is greedy and fanatical.

Hunanda: Female Tiefling Monk, NG. Str 11, Dex 10, Con 12, Int 13, Wis 10, Cha 8. Hunanda has dark purple hair and red eyes, and horns engraved with dark symbols. She wears modest garments and wields a kanabo (mace). Hunanda is forgiving and alluring.

Ortivatha: Female Tiefling Bard, NG. Str 6, Dex 9, Con 9, Int 12, Wis 8, Cha 13. Ortivatha has dark purple hair and black eyes, and a flicking forked tongue. She wears studded leather and wields a shortsword. Ortivatha is chivalrous and humble.

Albelchen: Female Tiefling Rogue, NE. Str 8, Dex 12, Con 8, Int 17, Wis 13, Cha 10. Albelchen has blood red skin, with gray hair and red eyes. She wears studded leather and wields a light hammer. Albelchen is sharp-tongued and immoral.

Wilguda: Female Tiefling Warlock, LE. Str 14, Dex 10, Con 7, Int 9, Wis 15, Cha 15. Wilguda has blood red skin, with dark red hair and red eyes. She wears leather armor and wields a handaxe and shortbow.

Amadalbe: Female Tiefling Monk, NG. Str 11, Dex 13, Con 10, Int 14, Wis 9, Cha 9. Amadalbe is willowy, with auburn hair and white eyes. She wears worn clothing and wields an ono (handaxe). Amadalbe has an animal companion, a tawny rat named Glasuintho.

Helchene: Female Tiefling Rogue, LN. Str 15, Dex 16, Con 10, Int 12, Wis 10, Cha 7. Helchene has brown hair and silver eyes, and rows of shark-like teeth. She wears leather armor and wields a longsword and darts. Helchene has an animal companion, a sable ferret named Elchelien.

Ortisoda: Female Tiefling Ranger, N. Str 15, Dex 8, Con 9, Int 8, Wis 9, Cha 8. Ortisoda has short silver hair and red eyes, and wears glasses with gold rims. She wears a chain shirt and wields a glaive. Ortisoda has dire rat named Gotha.

Glieva: Female Tiefling Wizard, LG. Str 9, Dex 13, Con 12, Int 17, Wis 11, Cha 12. Glieva has cropped copper hair and gold eyes, and a pair of tiny wings. She wears golden robes and wields a dagger and sling. Glieva is thrifty and lustful.

Gisune: Female Tiefling Barbarian, N. Str 14, Dex 7, Con 9, Int 8, Wis 8, Cha 8. Gisune is tall and willowy, with short gray hair and red eyes. She wears studded leather and wields a war pick and net. Gisune speaks with a stutter.

Amandame: Female Tiefling Monk, N. Str 16, Dex 13, Con 11, Int 8, Wis 15, Cha 11. Amandame has black hair and black eyes, and wears glasses with platinum rims. She wears well-made clothing and wields a bo (quarterstaff). Amandame was petrified for a hundred years.

Glasuintha: Female Tiefling Paladin, Good. Str 7, Dex 7, Con 11, Int 14, Wis 14, Cha 16. Glasuintha is short and overweight, with dark red hair and black eyes. She wears scale mail and wields a morningstar. Glasuintha holds a grudge against wizards.

Gisuintha: Female Tiefling Paladin, Good. Str 12, Dex 15, Con 10, Int 8, Wis 12, Cha 8. Gisuintha has brown hair and red eyes, and rows of shark-like teeth. She wears hide armor and wields a glaive. Gisuintha suffers an acute fear of crowds.

Hiudamalfr: Female Tiefling Monk, NG. Str 11, Dex 13, Con 6, Int 11, Wis 16, Cha 10. Hiudamalfr has black hair and gold eyes, and wears glasses with electrum rims. She wears travel-stained clothing and wields an ono (handaxe). Hiudamalfr is idealistic and devout.
Modela: Female Tiefling Barbarian, NG. Str 12, Dex 13, Con 11, Int 13, Wis 9, Cha 11. Modela is short, with dark blue hair and red eyes. She wears studded leather and wields a glaive.

Othodalbe: Female Tiefling Fighter, N. Str 14, Dex 12, Con 8, Int 12, Wis 6, Cha 7. Othodalbe is short and overweight, with braided red hair and gold eyes. She wears ring mail and wields a shortsword. Othodalbe suffers a traumatic fear of open spaces.

Elild: Female Tiefling Monk, CG. Str 11, Dex 14, Con 12, Int 11, Wis 8, Cha 12. Elild has curly white hair and gold eyes, and a distinctive scar on her arm. She wears well-made clothing and wields a kanabo (mace) and shuriken (darts). Elild has an animal companion, a golden monkey named Andad.

Hiudamerc: Female Tiefling Rogue, N. Str 10, Dex 12, Con 11, Int 11, Wis 10, Cha 12. Hiudamerc is tall and overweight, with uneven white hair and white eyes. She wears leather armor and wields a shortsword. Hiudamerc has an animal companion, a black snake named Odaldame.

Amalfris: Female Tiefling Cleric, CN. Str 9, Dex 12, Con 10, Int 5, Wis 12, Cha 16. Amalfris is short, with white hair and red eyes. She wears hide armor and wields a quarterstaff and dagger. Amalfris suffers a paralyzing fear of open spaces.

Amalama: Female Tiefling Barbarian, N. Str 15, Dex 13, Con 14, Int 10, Wis 9, Cha 13. Amalama has dark blue hair and white eyes, and a flicking forked tongue. She wears leather armor and wields a trident and blowgun. Amalama is decisive and serious.

Gaathilda: Female Tiefling Paladin, Good. Str 11, Dex 10, Con 8, Int 9, Wis 13, Cha 13. Gaathilda is willowy, with dark purple hair and white eyes. She wears splint armor and wields a rapier and shield. Gaathilda has an animal companion, a black warhorse named Sisansi.
Glieva: Female Tiefling Monk, N. Str 12, Dex 9, Con 11, Int 7, Wis 10, Cha 13. Glieva has crimson skin, with dark red hair and white eyes. She wears modest garments and wields an ono (handaxe).

Glasuintho: Female Tiefling Fighter, NE. Str 14, Dex 11, Con 10, Int 6, Wis 8, Cha 8. Glasuintho has blood red skin, with dark blue hair and white eyes. She wears ring mail and wields a greataxe. Glasuintho is searching for a legendary blade named Malign Fury.

Vada: Female Tiefling Paladin, Good. Str 12, Dex 10, Con 9, Int 9, Wis 17, Cha 11. Vada is tall and overweight, with dark purple hair and silver eyes. She wears plate armor and wields a warhammer and shield.

Gisune: Female Tiefling Monk, N. Str 10, Dex 11, Con 10, Int 14, Wis 16, Cha 15. Gisune has dark blue hair and red eyes, and horns engraved with fell symbols. She wears modest garments and wields an ono (handaxe) and shuriken (darts). Gisune has an animal companion, a golden monkey named Asunild.
